column1: obituary for: gunter manfred hiller | dare's funeral & cremation services| age 79
column4: 2015. survived by his wife of 59 years
column7: and pete (mary); many grandchildren and great-grandchildren; sister
column10: & operated hiller precision machine. funeral service will be on saturday
